data.text: In the distant past, our planet was home to a people we call the Ancients.
data.speaker: Guide

data.text: Many millennia before we discovered mako, these precursors were already pioneering its use.
data.speaker: Guide

data.text: Somehow they learned of the great reservoir of energy pulsing beneath their feet.
data.speaker: Guide

data.text: the Ancients developed the means to harness this bountiful energy and bend it to their will.
data.speaker: Guide

data.text: The fruits of their labors have survived to this very day in the form of certain kinds of materia.
data.speaker: Guide

data.text: "We who are born of the planet, with her we speak. Her flesh we shape."
data.speaker: Guide

data.text: "Unto her promised land shall we one day return. By her loving grace and providence may we take our place in paradise."
data.speaker: Guide

data.text: Alas, the Ancients themselves are long gone.
data.speaker: Guide

data.text: Two thousand years ago, a meteor brought an end to their civilization.
data.speaker: Guide

data.text: But before their fiery end, did the Ancients find their promised land?
data.speaker: Guide

data.text: Even now, we have only to wonder.
data.speaker: Guide

data.text: and the Shinra Electric Power Company is committed to changing and evolving with them.
data.speaker: Guide

data.text: Like the Ancients, we have harnessed the power of mako.
data.speaker: Guide

data.text: Are they out there, watching us? Waiting for us to join them in some blessed corner of the world─
data.speaker: Guide

data.text: a green and verdant land, where boundless mako energy will provide for our every need?
data.speaker: Guide

data.text: Shinra is working for you, to fulfill the hope of the Ancients and lead us to that promised land.
data.speaker: Guide

data.text: We shall not rest until our dream is realized.
data.speaker: Guide
